org.svvrl.goal.core.logic

Class FormulaHolder<T extends Logic>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.FormulaHolder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the logic
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACTLFormula, EditableORE, EditableRE, PLFormula, QPTLFormula

    public abstract class FormulaHolder<T extends Logic>
extends AbstractEditable
    A FormulaHolder holds a string that is supposed to be a formula of some logic.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
